text: Jurassic World Rebirth is an upcoming American science fiction action movie. It is expected to be released on July 2, 2025. It was directed by Gareth Edwards and produced by Frank Marshall and Patrick Crowley. It is the seventh main movie in the Jurassic Park series and is the sequel to the 2022 movie Jurassic World Dominion. The movie takes place five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion. It follows Zora Bennett, a woman who gets sent on a top-secret mission along with a paleontologist Dr. Henry Loomis and Duncan Kincaid. They are sent to find the first research facility used for Jurassic Park on an abandoned island so they can create a drug from the DNA of the three largest dinosaurs. Principal photography for the movie started in Thailand on June 13, 2024 and ended on September 27, 2024. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s science fiction movies Category:2020s action movies Category:2020s English- language movies Category:American 3D movies Category:American monster movies Category:Chase movies Category:IMAX movies Category:Jurassic Park movies Category:Movies about animal cruelty Category:Movies about dinosaurs Category:Movies about genetic engineering Category:Movies set in the 2020s Category:Science fiction action movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: Jurassic World Rebirth
